ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken?
What is your overall assessment of this course?
Do you expect to use this class for credit toward your major, or toward a pre-professional program?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize ECON 111 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend ECON 111 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: No - there is not a supporting environment.

I would definitely recommend the yearlong essay over the semester process simply because the finished product is a singular achievement in my academic career. The extra time allowed me to plan out my research and writing in such a way that it made the project a lot less daunting and stressful than I initially assumed it would be, and my final product was something I could be proud about having accomplished in a way that a forty page paper wouldn't have been.

I would recommend the yearlong experience if you're looking for a rigorous academic opportunity to produce original work. Don't be deterred by the 80-100 page requirement; it's manageable if you do good research and preparation in the first semester. Definitely consider giving it a shot!

The year long essay is a great way to delve into a larger topic. It is important, however, to make sure that you are committed to your topic and have a professor that you want to work with. It is a better pace than the semester essay.

Great experience. Absolutely worth doing the yearlong senior essay (though the 80-100 page requirement is crazy long.) Highly, highly recommend it. This is the best capstone to your undergraduate education
It's a bitch but glad I did it. Easy to say once its over, though.

Doing a year-long senior essay was an enormously rewarding process. I was grateful for how much free time I had in my schedule, and it was a terrific opportunity to dive deeply into a project I was excited about. It was also great to produce a paper that I was actually proud of, instead of the usual last-minute rushed work. Especially if you have a topic in mind that you are excited to spend a whole year working on, the year-long senior essay is worth considering seriously.
